description: Explore how blockchain technology is revolutionizing the logistics industry with insights from Maersk and IBM's TradeLens, FedEx's blockchain initiatives, and Walmart's food provenance tracking collaboration with IBM.
keywords: blockchain, logistics, TradeLens, Maersk, IBM, FedEx, Walmart, global shipping, dispute resolution, food provenance, technology innovation
title: Revolutionizing Logistics: The Blockchain Imperative
